unnormalised: Right, chalo, let's dish the garam masala on the latest B-town gossip, because who needs peace and quiet when you can have celebrity drama, am I right?
normalised: Right, come on, let's dish the hot spice on the latest B-town gossip, because who needs peace and quiet when you can have celebrity drama, am I right?

unnormalised: First up, whispers are flying faster than a Delhi auto-rickshaw about Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt allegedly having a "small tiff" over… wait for it… the correct way to make biryani. Sources (aka my cousin's neighbour's dog walker) say Alia insists on her grandma's Hyderabadi recipe, while Ranbir is a staunch supporter of his mother's Kashmiri version. This, apparently, almost ruined their romantic Onam dinner. Can you even imagine the horror? Biryani-gate, folks, I'm calling it!
normalised: First up, whispers are flying faster than a Delhi auto-rickshaw about Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt allegedly having a "small tiff" over… wait for it… the correct way to make biryani. Sources (a k a my cousin's neighbour's dog walker) say Alia insists on her grandma's Hyderabadi recipe, while Ranbir is a staunch supporter of his mother's Kashmiri version. This, apparently, almost ruined their romantic Onam dinner. Can you even imagine the horror? Biryani-gate, folks, I'm calling it!

unnormalised: Then there's the absolute chaos surrounding Deepika Padukone's latest film shoot in Kerala. Seems like a rogue monkey stole her sunglasses…again! Apparently, it's a recurring problem on set. Someone needs to hire Hanuman ji to keep these mischievous macaques in check. Last time, one made off with Ranveer Singh's lucky red underpants! The whole crew was running around in circles, shouting, "Aye, Bandar! Mere chaddi wapas karo!" It was quite the spectacle, I'm told.

unnormalised: And finally, the burning question on everyone's mind: Are Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal expecting? The paparazzi are convinced, spotting Katrina supposedly rocking a "suspiciously loose" kurta at the Ambani pre-wedding bash. I mean, come on, a loose kurta? That's practically grounds for a national investigation these days. Until we see a confirmed bump, I'm taking this one with a grain of Himalayan pink salt.

unnormalised: Remember folks, take all of this with a pinch of chilli powder and a whole lotta love. After all, it's just Bollywood, baby! And let’s be honest, a little bit of celebrity drama makes our chai break that much more exciting, hai na? Until next time, keep your ears to the ground and your eyes peeled for the next juicy tidbit! Bye bye.
